meanings.definition: A person who composes or performs music using the twelve-tone technique.
meanings.sent1: The dodecaphonists gathered to discuss their latest compositions.
meanings.sent2: Many dodecaphonists find inspiration in the works of Schoenberg.
meanings.sent3: The dodecaphonists' concert was so harmonious, it felt like a musical feast.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a dodecaphonists' workshop, arranging thoughts in perfect order.
meanings.sent5: The dodecaphonists' melodies danced through the air, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.definition: Those who adhere to the principles of twelve-tone music composition.
meanings.sent1: As dodecaphonists, they followed strict rules in their musical creations.
meanings.sent2: The group of dodecaphonists met regularly to discuss their innovative approaches.
meanings.sent3: The dodecaphonists' dedication to their craft was truly admirable.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, they were the dodecaphonists, shaping new sounds.
meanings.sent5: The dodecaphonists' unity in their musical vision was evident in every note played.
